about.title: About Us
about.profileIntro1: NEZA Construction is one of Turkey's leading construction companies with over 25 years of experience. We aim to provide the best service to our customers with a modern architectural approach, sustainable building techniques and high quality standards.
about.profileIntro2: Our company offers a wide range of services in residential, commercial, industrial and infrastructure projects, and embraces continuous improvement and innovation to maintain its leading position in the industry.
about.mission: To turn our customers' dreams into reality, to provide reliable and quality construction services, and to produce pioneering and innovative solutions in the industry. We build sustainable and environmentally friendly structures while keeping customer satisfaction at the forefront in every project.
about.vision: To be one of Turkey's leading construction companies, to develop projects to international standards, and to leave a better world for future generations by building sustainable and environmentally friendly structures. To set an example in the industry by keeping customer satisfaction at the highest level.
about.history2000: NEZA Construction was founded in Istanbul and began operations in the construction sector.
about.history2005: Strengthened its position in the sector by completing its first large-scale residential project.
about.history2010: Expanded its activities into commercial and industrial projects.
about.history2015: Took its place on the international stage by starting overseas projects.
about.history2020: Began developing environmentally friendly projects by investing in sustainable construction technologies.
about.history2025: One of the sector's leading companies with 150+ completed projects, 500K+ m² of built area and 1000+ satisfied customers.
about.managementIntro: NEZA Construction maintains its leadership in the sector with an experienced and visionary management team.

legal.privacyIntro: At Neza İnşaat, the security and privacy of your personal data are important to us. This privacy policy explains how information collected when you visit our website or use our services is processed.
legal.privacySection1Body: We may collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number and message through the contact form. This information is used solely to respond to your requests and to communicate with you about our services.
legal.privacySection2Body: The information we collect is used to evaluate your requests, provide quotes, deliver customer service and fulfil our legal obligations. Your data is not shared with third parties without your explicit consent.
legal.privacySection3Body: Your personal data is retained securely in line with legal retention periods and processing purposes. We take the necessary technical and organisational measures to protect your data from unauthorised access, loss or alteration.
legal.privacySection4Body: Under Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data, you may submit requests to us regarding access to, rectification, erasure or restriction of processing of your personal data. Your requests will be processed as soon as possible.
legal.privacySection5Body: You may contact us with any questions about our privacy policy or data processing practices.
legal.termsIntro: By using this website you are deemed to have accepted the following terms of use. Please read this page carefully.
legal.termsSection1Body: The Neza İnşaat website is published to provide information about our company and the construction services we offer. Content on the site is for information only and may be updated without prior notice.
legal.termsSection2Body: You agree to use this site only for lawful and appropriate purposes. Misuse of the site, distribution of harmful software or interference with third-party rights is prohibited. You are responsible for ensuring that the information you submit via the contact form is accurate and up to date.
legal.termsSection3Body: All text, images, logos and other content on the site belong to Neza İnşaat and are protected by copyright. Unauthorised copying, distribution or commercial use is prohibited.
legal.termsSection4Body: Information on the site is provided "as is". Project images and descriptions are for general information; official quotes and contracts apply for specific projects. Our company cannot be held liable for direct or indirect damages arising from use of the website.
legal.termsSection5Body: Neza İnşaat reserves the right to update these terms of use at any time. The current text will always be published on this page.
legal.kvkkIntro: At Neza İnşaat, we attach great importance to the protection of your personal data. Within the scope of Law No. 6698 on the Protection of Personal Data ("KVKK") and related legislation, we share our notice below to ensure your data security and provide a transparent service.
legal.kvkkSection1Body: Your personal data is processed by Neza İnşaat as the data controller in accordance with Law No. 6698.
legal.kvkkSection2Body: Your identity and contact data, such as name, email, phone number and message content collected via the contact form and other channels, are processed for the purposes of evaluating your requests, preparing quotes, contract processes and fulfilling legal obligations.
legal.kvkkSection3Body: Your personal data may be shared with business partners or authorised public bodies only to the extent required by law or for the performance of the service. Otherwise, no transfer to third parties is made without your explicit consent.
legal.kvkkSection4Body: Your personal data collected is retained for the period required by the purpose of processing and in compliance with legal retention periods. After this period, your data is deleted, anonymised or archived.
legal.kvkkSection5Body: Under KVKK Article 11 you have the right to learn whether your personal data is processed, to request information if it has been processed, to learn the purpose of processing and whether it is used accordingly, to know the third parties to whom it is transferred at home or abroad, to request rectification if incomplete or incorrect, to request deletion or destruction under the conditions set out in the Law, and to object to any result to your detriment arising from analysis by automated systems. You may contact us in writing or via registered electronic means to exercise these rights.
